<closed_at/> <closed_by/> <cmdb_ci/> <comments/> <comments_and_work_notes/> <company/> <contact_type/> <contract/> <control_definition>The organization provides cross-organizational audit information to organizationally-defined organizations based on organizationally-defined cross-organizational sharing agreements.  Systems processing, storing, or transmitting PHI:  The organization provides cross-organizational audit information to any organization with whom audit information containing PII or PHI is shared based on MOUs, MOAs, or other data sharing agreements.</control_definition> <control_family display_value="Audit and Accountability">6887b9fcdb211010280df36f29961951</control_family> <control_name>Sharing of Audit Information</control_name> C.F.R. ยง164.308(a)(5)(ii)(C); 45 C.F.R. ยง164.312(b); 45 C.F.R. ยง164.314</reference_policy> <rejection_goto/> <related_controls>CA-3</related_controls> <service_offering/> <short_description/> <sla_due/> <standard>NIST-800</standard> <state>1</state> <supplemental_guidance>Because of the distributed nature of the audit information, cross-organization sharing of audit information may be essential for effective analysis of the auditing being performed. For example, the audit records of one organization may not provide sufficient information to determine the appropriate or inappropriate use of organizational information resources by individuals in other organizations. In some instances, only the home organizations of individuals have the appropriate knowledge to make such determinations, thus requiring the sharing of audit information among organizations.  Guidance for systems processing, storing, or transmitting PHI:  Since an audit log may contain PHI, when audit information is shared between organizations, an agreement addressing the handling, protection, and disclosure of PHI is required.MOUs, memoranda of agreement (MOAs), and other data sharing agreements must address protection of PHI, audit content confidentiality ensuring authorized disclosures, and assurance that sharing agreement define which audit events and results are both captured and shared.</supplemental_guidance> <sys_class_name>x_415531_rapid_ato_ars_3_1</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-06-19 13:21:23</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>09ff3d105f231000b12e3572f2b4775d</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>!!!/!!!/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>6087b9fcdb211010280df36f2996199a</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-06-19 13:21:23</sys_updated_on> <task_for/> <time_worked/> <upon_approval>proceed</upon_approval> <upon_reject>cancel</upon_reject> <urgency>3</urgency> <user_input/> <variables/> <watch_list/> <wf_activity/> <work_end/> <work_notes/> <work_notes_list/> <work_start/> </x_415531_rapid_ato_ars_3_1> </record_update>
